name: AnimatedAlign
desc: Animated version of [Align] which automatically transitions the child's position over a given duration whenever the given [alignment] changes.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: heightFactor
fields.desc: If non-null, sets its height to the child's height multiplied by this factor.

fields.name: widthFactor
fields.desc: If non-null, sets its width to the child's width multiplied by this factor.
